Tweet anything from Firefox context menu.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2"/>

= Compatibility =

 * Firefox 4.0 - 7.`*`

= Installation =
 * [https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/tweet-context/ Mozilla Add-ons]
 * [http://loucypher.googlecode.com/svn/TweetContext/xpi/TweetContext-dev.xpi dev build]

= Features =

== Context menus ==

 * Main context menu
  * on web page
  * on a link
  * on a frame/iframe
  * on an image
  * tweet selected text

 * Tab context menu

 * Bookmark context menu

 * Bookmarks and History sidebar context menu

== Add-on integration ==

You can choose to use the following add-on to tweet or use Twitter [https://twitter.com/intent/tweet tweet page] (default).

 * Echofon - use [http://www.echofon.com/ Echofon] if available.
 * !HootBar - use [http://hootsuite.com/hootbar HootBar] if available.
